sentences.sContent: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentences.sCn: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

sentences.sContent: Sir Richard Marsh, the sometime chairman of British Rail
sentences.sCn: 理查德•马什爵士，英国铁路公司前董事长

trans.tranOther: at a time in the future or in the past, although you do not know exactly when
